raw_mentions:
Here are the extracted sentences that meet the criteria:


The binding assay of human NK1R expressed in either COS or CHO cells is based on the use of <sup>125</sup> I-substance P (<sup>125</sup> I-Sp, from DU PONT, Boston, Mass.) as a radioactively labeled ligand which competes with unlabeled substance P or any other ligand for binding to the human NK1R, 200 ul of cells were added to a tube containing 20 ul of 1.5 to 2.5 nM of <sup>125</sup> I-SP and 20 ul of unlabeled substance P or any other test compound.
Substance P is added to the well at final concentration of 0.3 nM to activate the human NK1R.
